title: FS: T-206 HOF's all SGC Graded-Prices Reduced
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: FS: T-206 HOF's all SGC Graded-Prices Reduced
posts.post_content:
Available for sale are the following SGC graded T206 HOF's. As usual the first PM to take one at listed price trumps all negotiations/offers unless already accepted. Offers welcome as well.

Young Portrait SC 350-30 SGC 30                    SOLD
Marquard Follow Through PD 350/460 SGC 40  $220
Tinker Portrait PD 150 SGC 40                         $325
Marquard Portrait SC 350-25 SGC 40               $280
Baker PD 350/460 SGC 20                              $110
J. Collins PD 350 SGC 30                                 SOLD
Tinker Bat Off Shoulder PD 350/460 SGC 30     SOLD
Clarke Holding Bat PD 150 SGC 20                   $65
Duffy SC 350/460-42 SGC 10                          $65

Adam,

I'll take Cy Young and Jimmy Collins at your listed prices, if they're still available.  Thanks!

Marty
